caption: This video clip is from a spiderman movie, detailing the protagonist's growth as the only Spider-Man in Brooklyn. In the clip, he faces new challenges, having to confront his past and the expectations of his family while also going after various villains. Ultimately, he accepts his identity and becomes Spider-Man. Highlights include: the protagonist being the sole Spider-Man in Brooklyn, him confronting new challenges and family expectations, him assisting Jeopardy and announcing baby powder, and his acceptance of his identity as Spider-Man. He dreams of participating in the nation's leading physics game and studying at Princeton University.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like an animated movie.
